info.name: Amour Sucre/MCL forum tools
info.description:
You can get fast response on forums or see kaomojis instead of normal emoticons, interested? :D
Working on ALL versions(url starting with www!)

options.label: kaomoji power ٩( 'ω' )و
normal emojis, not images

settings.label: hide emoticon box from posting forms

options.label: yes
options.value:
#forum > div.pun.box.pun_fast_response > form > div.box > fieldset > div > div.smileys, #post > div:nth-child(1) > fieldset > div.smileys {
visibility: hidden !important}
